mapper.select: /* InstlManageMapper.getAgencyDtlList */ SELECT tci.DT, 0 AS BUY_CNT, 0 AS BUY_AMT, 0 AS BUY_STORE, tci.INST_CNT AS INST_CNT, tci.STORE_CD, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = tci.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM, tci.POS_NO, 0 AS REST_CNT, tci.INST_FG AS MEMO FROM TB_CM_AGENCY tca, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DT, AGENCY_CD, COUNT(STORE_CD) AS INST_CNT, STORE_CD, POS_NO, INST_FG FROM TB_CM_INSTLL WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ_NO = '1' AND INST_FG = '1' GROUP BY REG_DT, AGENCY_CD, STORE_CD, POS_NO, INST_FG ) tci WHERE 1=1 AND tca.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tca.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tci.AGENCY_CD (+)= tca.AGENCY_CD ORDER BY tci.DT, tci.STORE_CD, tci.POS_NO

/* InstlManageMapper.getAgencyPurchsList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tssh.SALE_DATE AS MAX_SALE_DATE, COUNT(tmp.POS_NO) AS POS_CNT, tms.AGENCY_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_CM_AGENCY tca, TB_MS_POS tmp, ( SELECT tssh.STORE_CD, MAX(tssh.SALE_DATE) AS SALE_DATE FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh GROUP BY tssh.STORE_CD ) tssh WHERE 1=1 AND tca.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tms.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tca.AGENCY_CD = tms.AGENCY_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD AND tssh.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD GROUP BY tms.AGENCY_CD, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tssh.SALE_DATE ORDER BY tms.AGENCY_CD, tms.STORE_CD

/* InstlManageMapper.getInstlDtlList */ SELECT tci.INST_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tci.INST_REQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS INST_REQ_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tci.INST_INS_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS INST_INS_DT, (SELECT AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE AGENCY_CD = tms.AGENCY_CD) AS AGENCY_NM, (SELECT AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE AGENCY_CD = tci.AGENCY_CD) AS INSTL_AGENCY_NM, tci.INST_INS_ID FROM TB_CM_INSTLL tci, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE 1=1 AND tci.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tci.POS_NO = #{posNo} AND tms.STORE_CD (+)= tci.STORE_CD ORDER BY tci.INST_REQ_DT, tci.INST_INS_DT

SELECT tci.SEQ_NO , tci.INST_FG , tci.AGENCY_CD , tca.AGENCY_NM , tci.INST_REQ_ID , tci.INST_INS_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tci.INST_REQ_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS INST_REQ_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tci.INST_INS_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS INST_INS_DT , tci.INST_REASON , tci.REMARK FROM TB_CM_INSTLL tci, TB_CM_AGENCY tca WHERE 1=1 AND tca.AGENCY_CD (+)= tci.AGENCY_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND POS_NO = #{posNo}
